Html:
From 2.1.3 where Thunderheart is still consistently valued higher than all other pieces in slot to 2.1.4 where Thunderheart isn't even in the gear list, I seem to have gone to a completely different suggested gear set.

This might be an issue with the item cache, but I find no way to reintroduce these items to Rawr in this release.  Editing items and 'Adding' does nothing.  Updating the item cache does nothing.  What's going on here?  Any idea?
Where it basically says: "By default, rawr now filters out TBC/Classic items. Click the filter dropdown list and enable it."
